project_details: Project Alpha: Legacy server migration to AWS. Status: 85% complete.
milestones: DB Migration - DONE. S3 Bucket setup - DONE.
latest_update: Final testing of the load balancer is underway.

project_details: Project SolarSync: Dashboard UI for smart grids. Status: Design Phase.
milestones: Figma Wireframes - Approved. React scaffolding - Starting.
latest_update: Design system finalized; developers are initializing the React app.

project_details: Project CargoTrack: Real-time GPS tracking mobile app. Status: Testing.
milestones: iOS Build - Testing. Android Build - Ready for QA.
latest_update: Fixing a minor latency issue with the Google Maps API integration.

project_details: Project MedData: HIPAA compliant data warehouse. Status: Security Audit.
milestones: Data ingestion - DONE. Encryption at rest - DONE.
latest_update: Internal security audit passed. External audit scheduled for Friday.

project_details: Project OmniShop: E-commerce platform upgrade. Status: Deployment.
milestones: Checkout overhaul - DONE. Stripe integration - DONE.
latest_update: Zero-downtime deployment successfully executed on the staging server.

project_details: Project Vault: Blockchain-based audit trail. Status: Development.
milestones: Smart contract logic - 90%. Frontend bridge - In Progress.
latest_update: Developer identified a bug in the smart contract gas estimation.

project_details: Project ClassMate: AI-driven personalized learning paths. Status: Pilot.
milestones: LLM integration - DONE. Content tagging - DONE.
latest_update: Pilot phase started with 50 students. Early feedback is very positive.

project_details: Project TrafficSense: IoT sensors for city traffic. Status: Data Analysis.
milestones: Sensor hardware setup - DONE. Data stream - Live.
latest_update: Gathering initial data points. AI model training will begin next week.

project_details: Project Wanderer: Multilingual travel booking engine. Status: MVP Phase.
milestones: Search engine - DONE. Payment gateway - Pending.
latest_update: Waiting for client approval on the international currency conversion logic.

project_details: Project SiteManager: AR overlay for architectural plans. Status: R&D.
milestones: AR Core integration - DONE. 3D Model loading - Testing.
latest_update: Refining the 3D model occlusion to work better in outdoor lighting.
